ref: 1982 *uddanta ʻ without teeth ʼ. [Replaces adantáka -- TS., adánt˚ ŚBr. (~ uddantura -- ʻ formidable ʼ lex., Pk. uddaṁtura -- ʻ with projecting teethʻ ). -- dánta -- ]
A. udã̄t, udãtiyā ʻ not changing the first teeth (of cattle) ʼ;
Bi. udant ʻ a calf before it has got its true teeth ʼ;
H. udãt ʻ without teeth (of a calf) ʼ.
